typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		c1 as integer,
		c2 as string,
		c3 as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	batchSize: 100,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 select() ~> Select1
Select1 derive(test = toString(null())) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	filePattern:('PRODUCT_' + toString(currentDate(), 'yyyyMMdd') + '[nn].csv')) ~> sink1
